description:
when configured for virsh VPD is attempting to execute $2 instead of an actual command.

title: baremetal virtual power driver attempts to execute $2 instead of actual command when configured for virsh

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/24236
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/e7b6be37ebf16628d9b6a962f255bdf3524ec382

Branch:    master

commit e7b6be37ebf16628d9b6a962f255bdf3524ec382
Author: Chris Krelle <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Mar 12 12:41:12 2013 -0700

    Virtual Power Driver list running vms quoting error
    
    This patch corrects a issue with VPD when configured for virsh the
    list running vms function attempts to execute $2 instead of the actual
    command.
    
    Fixes Bug 1154280
    
    Change-Id: I6d06cc58fb0f2935c4341761908b914106bda916
    Authored-by: Chris Krelle <email address hidden>
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
